name: Train GPT OSS 20B with LoRA
description: Remote task for training gpt-oss-20b with LoRA

config.command: MASTER_ADDR=$(echo "$SKYPILOT_NODE_IPS" | head -n1) && NP=$(($SKYPILOT_NUM_GPUS_PER_NODE * $SKYPILOT_NUM_NODES)) && python train.py --model_id openai/gpt-oss-20b --enable_lora --max_steps 100 --save_steps 20
config.setup: uv pip install torch && uv pip install 'trl>=0.20.0' 'peft>=0.17.0' 'transformers>=4.55.0' && uv pip install deepspeed && uv pip install transformerlab && uv pip install git+https://github.com/huggingface/accelerate.git@c0a3aefea8aa5008a0fbf55b049bd3f0efa9cbf2
